functions.name: isMonotonic
functions.description: This function checks if the input array is either constantly increasing or constantly decreasing

return_values.description: Array is either constantly increasing or decreasing
return_values.name: result

return_values.description: Array is not constantly increasing or decreasing
return_values.name: result

edge_cases: Array with all elements the same
functions.body: Iterate through the array, checking if each element is greater than or equal to the previous one (for increasing) or less than or equal to the previous one (for decreasing). If neither condition is met for all elements, return false. If one condition is met for all elements, return true.
